div.p:
The following package file includes an NPM package file used by many of the FHIR tools. It contains all profiles, code systems, etc. defined in this version of the Implementation Guide. See the overview on validating FHIR profiles and resources here.
Package
The entire implementation guide (including the HTML files, definitions, validation information, etc.) may be downloaded here.

Below are format-specific definitions files.
XML
JSON
TTL

All the examples that are used in this Implementation Guide available for download:
